name: Lopatix' Descent
description:
"By Toutatis, the sky is falling on my head!"

Lopatix' Descent is a 2D arcade platformer, where the player has only one goal: RUN. From the sky.

The sky is falling, and the only way left is down. Embrace the darkness.

Good luck, Lopatix!

Features:

  • 6 hand-crafted intro levels and a procedurally generated level
  • a variety of upgrades and bonuses
  • lucrative high scores

Share your Endless level high scores down below!

Controls:

  • B - view controls
